channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NJ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NJ

item.title: Report X-2023071191
item.description:
Report X-2023071191

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-18
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: UPON UNLOADING THE PACKAGE, A PACKAGE HANDLER NOTICED THE BOX WAS WET AND NOTIFIED A MANAGER. HAZMAT WAS PLACED IN HAZMAT BAG AND HAZMAT TOTE AND BROUGHT DOWN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE AND PROCESSED. DescribePack: ONE OF THE BOTTLES OF THE SYSMEX WRIGHT STAIN HAD A CRACK BEHIND THE HANDLE AT THE SEAM OF THE BOTTLE. IT LEAKED OUT SOILING THE OTHER BOTTLES AND OUTER PACKAGING. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED IN HAZMAT BAG AND HAZMAT TOTE. THEN BROUGHT DOWN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE AND WAS PROCESSED.

item.title: Report X-2023071168
item.description:
Report X-2023071168

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-18
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE UNLOAD PROCESS THE BOX WAS NOTICED TO BE WET BY THE MANAGER AND THEN PROMPTLY TAKEN OVER TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO BE SECURED AND VENTILATED. i WAS THEN NOTIFIED THAT I HAD A BOX WAITING FOR ME IN THE HAZMAT CAGE. i QUICKLY WENT OVER TO THE CAGE AND REPACKED SAID PACKAGE INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM PROPERLY AND SAFELY AND AM NOW WAITING FOR THE DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: APPROXIMATELY 1/4 CUP HAD LEAKED OUT OF ONE CONTAINER OF THE PART B SOLUTION DUE TO A LOOSE CAP ON JUST THAT ONE BOTTLE. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: QUICKLY TAKING PACKAGE OVER TO HAZMAT CAGE TO VENTILATE AND ALSO REPACKING SECURELY INTO A YELLOW DRUM.

item.description:
Report X-2023080244

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED FROM TRAILER AND IT WAS WET. PACKAGE TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE, SECURED, REPACKED IN A SALVAGE DRUM AND AWAITING DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: BOTTLE HAD A CRACK IN SEAM AT THE BOTTOM AND LEAKED OUT DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE, SECURED, REPACKED AND AWAITING DISPOSITION FROM PGH.

item.title: Report X-2023080211
item.description:
Report X-2023080211

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-20
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: HAZMAT WAS LOADED ONTO A TRAILER WITH BARN DOORS. WHEN THE TRAILER WAS BEING PULLED AWAY IT FELL OUT OF THE TRAILER. THE PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY SECURED AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE AND WAS PROCESSED. DescribePack: 1 GAL BOTTLE HAD CRACKED AT THE SEAM BEHIND THE HANDLE AND LEAKED OUT, SOILING THE OTHER BOTTLES AND ONE OTHER BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: IT WAS SECURED PROPERLY AND BROUGHT DOWN TO THE HAZMAT CAGE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2023080052
item.description:
Report X-2023080052

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-25
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED IN THE HAZMAT CAGE. PACKAGE WAS LEAKING IT WAS SECURED, REPACKED IN A SALVAGE DRUM AND AWAITING DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: 1 5 LITER CONTAINER HAD THE CAP COMPLETELY OFF AND ENTIRE CONTENTS LEAKED OUT. PACKAGE APPEARED TO HAVE BEEN DROPPED DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS SECURED, REPACKED IN A SALVAGE DRUM AND AWAITING DISPOSITION FROM PGH.

item.title: Report X-2023071001
item.description:
Report X-2023071001

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-12
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1.X-2023071001 SequenceEvent: DURING THE UNLOAD PROCESS THE MANAGER NOTICED THAT THE PACKAGE WAS WET AND IMMEDIATELY TOOK PACKAGE OVER TO HAZMAT CAGE TO SECURE IT AND VENTILATE IT. MANAGER THEN NOTIFIED ME TO COME OVER TO PROCESS THE DAMAGED HAZMAT. I THEN PROCEEDED TO REPACK THE PACKAGE INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM AND AM WAITING FOR THE DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: APPROXIMATELY 2 CUPS LEAKED OUT OF ONE BOTTLE OF THE PART B CONTAINER DUE TO A LOOSE CAP. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: QUICKLY TAKING THE PACKAGE OVER TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO SECURE IT AND VENTILATE IT AND THEN QUICKLY REPACKING IT INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM. 2. X-2023071002 SequenceEvent: DURING THE UNLOAD PROCESS THE MANAGER NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS WET AND IMMEDIATELY TOOK PACKAGE OVER TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO SECURE IT AND TO VENTILATE IT AS WELL. MANAGER THEN NOTIFIED ME TO GO OVER AND PROCESS THE DAMAGED HAZMAT. I THEN PROCEEDED TO REPACK THE PACKAGE INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM AND AM WAITING FOR THE DISPOSITION FROM PGH. DescribePack: APPROXIMATELY 3 CUPS LEAKED OUT OF ONE BOTTLE OF THE PART B CONTAINER DUE TO A LOOSE CAP. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: QUICKLY TAKING THE PACKAGE OVER TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO SECURE IT AND VENTILATE IT AND THEN QUICKLY HAVING ME GO OVER TO REPACK IT INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM.

item.title: Report X-2023070911
item.description:
Report X-2023070911

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-10
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVER NIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS LEAKAGE. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION 1 PLASTIC JERRICAN CONTAINING ZEP INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER (SODIUM HYDROXIDE) WAS FOUND SLIGHTLY LEAKING FROM THE BOTTOM. THE JERRICAN WAS PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURNED TO SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: THE CAUSED OF FAILURE WAS DUE TO IMPORPER HANDLING WHILE UNLOADING. THE PLASTIC JERRICAN WAS SLIGHTLY LEAKING DUE A PUNCTURE. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: THE PLASTIC JERRICAN WAS PLACED IN A LINED SALAVGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2023070895
item.description:
Report X-2023070895

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-10
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the day sort, the plastic pail containing "Diversey clax build booster" arrived at the hazmat cage with leakage. Upon inspection it was found to have a puncture. The package was placed into a salvage drum to be returned to shipper unless otherwise. DescribePack: The pail failure have come from a mishap during the loading process. The pail got punctured when placed on the IC Belt. The puncture is towards the bottom of the pail and its a small gash. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: The pail was flipped, covered with a spillage pad and placed into a lined salvage drum.

item.title: Report E-2023070865
item.description:
Report E-2023070865

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-22
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that 5 of the poly 5 gallon pails of sodium hydroxide (un1760) had released 25 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.
